events.name: Lithium-Ion Recycling
events.wd_description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: Pyrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.
events.description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.

events.name: Hydrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: Bioleaching
events.wd_description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.
events.description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.

events.name: Wafer production
events.wd_description: Over 90 percent of the world's wafer production capacity is in China, crucial for PV supply chain dominance.
events.description: Over 90 percent of the world's wafer production capacity is in China, crucial for PV supply chain dominance.

events.name: Wafer manufacturing dominance
events.description: More than 90% of wafer manufacturing capacity is located in China, highlighting the country's dominance.

events.name: Polysilicon production
events.wd_description: The upstream part of the PV value chain, polysilicon production, is highly consolidated with significant Chinese presence.
events.description: The upstream part of the PV value chain, polysilicon production, is highly consolidated with significant Chinese presence.

events.name: Polysilicon market concentration
events.description: The polysilicon market is highly consolidated, with a significant presence of Chinese firms.
